      static java.lang.String KEY_INSTALL_REFERRER

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onReceive(android.content.Context context, android.content.Intent intent)
      Handles the intent from the Android system containing the referrer information If referrer is found, and Tealium is already initialized, it stores the referrer in the Tealium data model
      static void setReferrerPersistent(java.lang.String tealiumInstanceName)
      Method will add the install referrer string to the persistent data store and send with all future requests
      static void setReferrerVolatile(java.lang.String tealiumInstanceName)
      Method will add the install referrer string to the volatile data store and send with all requests until the app is closed

    • Field Detail

      • KEY_INSTALL_REFERRER

        public static final java.lang.String KEY_INSTALL_REFERRER
        Value - "install_referrer", keyname used to store the referrer string in volatile or persistent data. Can be used to later remove the value from the data layer if necessary.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • InstallReferrerReceiver

        public InstallReferrerReceiver()

    • Method Detail

      • setReferrerVolatile

        public static void setReferrerVolatile(java.lang.String tealiumInstanceName)
        Method will add the install referrer string to the volatile data store and send with all requests until the app is closed
        Parameters:
        tealiumInstanceName - String The Tealium instance name used when initializing Tealium

      • setReferrerPersistent

        public static void setReferrerPersistent(java.lang.String tealiumInstanceName)
        Method will add the install referrer string to the persistent data store and send with all future requests
        Parameters:
        tealiumInstanceName - String The Tealium instance name used when initializing Tealium

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(android.content.Context context,
                      android.content.Intent intent)
        Handles the intent from the Android system containing the referrer information If referrer is found, and Tealium is already initialized, it stores the referrer in the Tealium data model
        Specified by:
        onReceive in class android.content.BroadcastReceiver
